Questions.Question: Which celebrity chef is known for their restaurant 'Per Se'?
Questions.Explanation: Thomas Keller is the renowned chef behind the Michelin-starred restaurant 'Per Se' in New York City.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the celebrity chef who owns 'The French Laundry'?
Questions.Explanation: Thomas Keller is the acclaimed chef and owner of the world-famous restaurant 'The French Laundry' in California.

Questions.Question: Which celebrity chef is associated with the restaurant 'Nobu'?
Questions.Explanation: Nobu Matsuhisa is the renowned chef behind the upscale Japanese restaurant chain 'Nobu'.

Questions.Question: Who is the celebrity chef known for their restaurant 'Momofuku'?
Questions.Explanation: David Chang is the innovative chef and founder of the Momofuku restaurant group, which includes 'Momofuku Noodle Bar'.

Questions.Question: Which celebrity chef is associated with the restaurant 'Alinea'?
Questions.Explanation: Grant Achatz is the visionary chef behind the avant-garde restaurant 'Alinea' in Chicago.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the celebrity chef who owns 'Eleven Madison Park'?
Questions.Explanation: Daniel Humm is the talented chef and co-owner of the acclaimed restaurant 'Eleven Madison Park' in New York City.

Questions.Question: Which celebrity chef is known for their restaurant 'The Fat Duck'?
Questions.Explanation: Heston Blumenthal is the innovative chef behind the three-Michelin-starred restaurant 'The Fat Duck' in England.

Questions.Question: Who is the celebrity chef associated with the restaurant 'Le Bernardin'?
Questions.Explanation: Eric Ripert is the acclaimed chef and co-owner of the world-renowned seafood restaurant 'Le Bernardin' in New York City.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the celebrity chef who owns 'Osteria Francescana'?
Questions.Explanation: Massimo Bottura is the talented chef and owner of the three-Michelin-starred restaurant 'Osteria Francescana' in Italy.

Questions.Question: Which celebrity chef is associated with the restaurant 'El Bulli'?
Questions.Explanation: Ferran Adrià is the pioneering chef behind the now-closed restaurant 'El Bulli', known for its innovative molecular gastronomy.

Questions.Question: Who is the celebrity chef known for their restaurant 'D.O.M.'?
Questions.Explanation: Alex Atala is the acclaimed chef and owner of the renowned restaurant 'D.O.M.' in Brazil, known for its Amazonian ingredients.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the celebrity chef who owns 'Mirazur'?
Questions.Explanation: Mauro Colagreco is the talented chef and owner of the three-Michelin-starred restaurant 'Mirazur' in France.

Questions.Question: Which celebrity chef is known for their restaurant 'Central'?
Questions.Explanation: Virgilio Martínez is the innovative chef behind the acclaimed restaurant 'Central' in Peru, known for its elevation-inspired cuisine.

Questions.Question: Who is the celebrity chef associated with the restaurant 'Pujol'?
Questions.Explanation: Enrique Olvera is the renowned chef and owner of the world-famous restaurant 'Pujol' in Mexico City.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the celebrity chef who owns 'Attica'?
Questions.Explanation: Ben Shewry is the talented chef and owner of the acclaimed restaurant 'Attica' in Australia, known for its innovative cuisine.

Questions.Question: Which celebrity chef is associated with the restaurant 'Gaggan'?
Questions.Explanation: Gaggan Anand is the visionary chef behind the progressive Indian restaurant 'Gaggan' in Bangkok.

Questions.Question: Who is the celebrity chef known for their restaurant 'Mugaritz'?
Questions.Explanation: Andoni Luis Aduriz is the acclaimed chef and owner of the renowned restaurant 'Mugaritz' in Spain.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the celebrity chef who owns 'Geranium'?
Questions.Explanation: Rasmus Kofoed is the talented chef and owner of the three-Michelin-starred restaurant 'Geranium' in Denmark.

Questions.Question: Which celebrity chef is known for their restaurant 'Azurmendi'?
Questions.Explanation: Eneko Atxa is the renowned chef behind the three-Michelin-starred restaurant 'Azurmendi' in Spain.

Questions.Question: Who is the celebrity chef associated with the restaurant 'Quintonil'?
Questions.Explanation: Jorge Vallejo is the acclaimed chef and owner of the world-renowned restaurant 'Quintonil' in Mexico City.
